name: Snap Circuits BRIC Light, Building Bricks & Electric Circuit Kit for Kids, STEM Educational Toy for Kids 8+, Light Up Bricks, 10 Builds Included, Compatible with All Major Brands
short_description: Build, Light Up & Learn! – BRIC LIGHT is a brick building set combining classic building brick fun with real working circuits and lights—bringing creations to life like never before. It makes electronics for kids fun!

10 Builds Included, Creativity Unlimited – This interactive toy for kids comes with instructions for 10 exciting projects, but the real magic starts when kids explore their own imaginative designs. From Bricks to Bright Ideas—STEM Learning Starts Here!
Fully Brick-Compatible – Designed to work seamlessly with bricks from other leading brands, so kids can expand their builds with pieces they already love.
Boosts STEM & Problem-Solving Skills – This kids STEM toy encourages hands-on learning, critical thinking, and creative experimentation from planning and building to wiring and lighting.

Confidence-Boosting Play – As kids bring their ideas to life, they gain pride and confidence in what they can build—developing real-world skills in a fun, screen-free way. It's the ultimate idea for STEM gifts.
product_description: Bric Light combines the best of Snap Circuits with building bricks and speical light up bricks to create endless combinations of construction and circuitry! With patent-pending, bric-2-snap technology, kids can wire up their brick builds with Snap Circuits lights, sounds, moving parts, and 3-D circuits to invent almost anything and make it go! Kids can energize their brick building experience with Snap Circuits and build innovative structures! Instead of just building a structure, now children can learn how to build the circuit that makes the lights on a skyscraper illuminate or that makes the gears on a drawbridge move! Elenco’s team of engineers has come up with a great way for kids to learn-by-doing and be creative with their everyday building bricks. There's no limit to what kids can create with Snap Circuits bric: structures! Our award-winning Snap Circuits products teach kids to have fun learning electricity, engineering, circuitry and more. Snap Circuits features building components with snaps to assemble electronic circuits that function like the printed circuit board found in most electronic products.
product_details: Manufacturer recommended age 8 years and up

name: SNAP CIRCUITS Snap & Draw STEAM Toy for Boys and Girls | STEM Toy for Kids 4+ yrs | Art & Science Activity Kit | Building Kit
short_description: Hands-On STEAM Activity Kit – Combines art, creativity, and simple circuit building to let kids bring their drawings to life with real sound.

Color, Build, and Activate – Kids color one of four included scenes (beach, savannah, jungle, or farm) plus two 3-D pop-out elements, then build an easy Snap Circuits sound module to make the scene interactive.

Watch (and Hear) Artwork Come Alive – Place the colored art over the sound circuit, switch it on, and enjoy scene-specific sounds like safari animals, ocean waves, and more. 2AA Batteries Required (not included)
Perfect for Young Creators (Ages 4+) – Designed for early learners with safe, simple components and frustration-free building.

Encourages Creativity & STEM Skills – Blends imaginative art with hands-on circuit exposure to spark curiosity in science, engineering, and design. Make your own template and bring your own scene to life.
Meaningful, Screen-Free Play – Offers a tactile, creative activity that keeps kids engaged without electronics or devices.
2AA Batteries Required (not included)
product_description: SNAP & DRAW by SNAP CIRCUITS® – Where Art Meets Electricity! Unleash creativity and ignite curiosity with SNAP & DRAW, an exciting hands-on STEAM activity kit from SNAP CIRCUITS®. Kids start by building a real working sound circuit, then color a vibrant scene and watch it come to life with sounds! Combining art and engineering, this kit lets young creators explore how electricity works while expressing their imagination. With a reusable blank template included, kids can design and animate their own custom scenes again and again.

name: Snap Circuits Beginner, Electronics Exploration Kit, Stem Kit for Ages 5-9 (SCB-20)
short_description: SO MANY TOYS IN A SNAP: A safe and fun way to introduce children ages 5+ to electrical engineeing! The child-friendly pieces easily snap together to create real working circuits! Build exciting projects and toys using the included colorful instruction book!

SAFE FOR YOUNGER KIDS The Snap Circuits Beginner is the perfect way to introduce children starting at age 5 to circuitry. In addition to simpler projects and instructions, the Beginner kit includes circuits with extra childproofing features for your smallest engineer! Best for ages 5-9

EXPERIMENTS THEY'LL LOVE The Beginner kit includes hours of wonder-inspiring experiments! Children will learn more than just the basics of how switches and circuits work. Over the course of 21 unique projects, they'll build simple problem-solving, troubleshooting, and planning skills!
AMAZING VALUE In addition to standard kit components, the Beginner kit includes a lighted color-changing fan and a vibrant colored manual with age-appropriate diagrams and language.

AWARD WINNING KITS! We're proud to produce high quality products loved by kids, parents,and educators. Snap Circuits kits have won a number of awards - including the Specialty Toy of the Year Award, Seriously STEM! award, Good Housekeeping's Best Toys, Purdue University's Engineering Gift Guide, National Parenting Center's Seal of Approval, Toy Insider's Top Holiday Toys, placement on the Dr. Toy list of 100 Best Children's Products and placement on the Dr. Toy list of Best Educational products, and the "Stem Approved" Trustmark from Stem.org.

name: STEM Toys for Kids Build Your Own FM Radio Kit, Science Kits for Kids Age 8-12 12-14,DIY Electronic Snap Circuits Projects Gifts for Teen Girls Boys (Wooden Radio)
short_description: Educational STEM Kit: Build your own functional FM radio from scratch with this engaging DIY science kit designed for kids and beginners.
Hands-on Learning: Assemble the radio components yourself, including the circuit board, antenna, speaker, and battery case for a rewarding hands-on experience.
Wide Frequency Range: Once assembled, tune into your favorite FM stations within the 88-108 MHz frequency range.
Compact and Portable: The radio's compact wooden design allows you to take your creation with you wherever you go.
Complete Kit: Comes with all necessary parts and a detailed instruction manual to guide you through the assembly process.
product_description: Unleash your child's creativity and foster their interest in STEM with this engaging FM Radio Kit! It's an all-in-one science kit that allows kids to build their own functional FM radio from scratch. The kit comes with a colorful, flower-shaped speaker and a vibrant boombox base, making it an eye-catching and fun project. As they assemble the radio, children will learn about electronics, circuits, and the principles of radio technology in a hands-on way. With easy-to-follow instructions, this STEM toy encourages problem-solving, critical thinking, and a sense of accomplishment. Once completed, kids can tune in to their favorite radio stations and enjoy the music they've brought to life. It's an educational yet entertaining gift that sparks curiosity and fosters a love for science.

name: Snap Circuits Extreme SC-750R Electronics Exploration Kit + Student Training Program with Student Study Guide | Perfect for STEM Curriculum
short_description: A safe and fun way to introduce children ages 8+ to the basics of electrical engineering! Build exciting projects and toys using the included colorful instruction book!

FUN AND FUNCTIONAL: Will your kid play tunes on a radio built from scratch or quiz you with a homemade lie detector? With this kit, they can do both! Projects include sound activated switch, adjustable light controller, AM radio, lie detector, rechargeable battery and so many more! Build over 750 unique electronic projects with this 80+ piece kit.

AMAZING VALUE In addition to the standard kit components, the Extreme SC-750R set includes a electromagnet, power amplifier, vibration switch, analog meter, and solar cell. CI-73 computer interface lets children see how waveforms and frequencies act as their circuits come to life!

LEARN BY DOING: Teach though hands-on exploration! Our 750R kit comes with the student training program with study guide. Perfect for home-schooling or sneaking in some extra learning with a toy they'll love! This kit will keep them engaged and having fun!

AWARD WINNING KITS! We're proud to produce high quality products loved by kids, parents,and educators. Snap Circuits kits have won a number of awards - including the Specialty Toy of the Year Award, Seriously STEM! award, Good Housekeeping's Best Toys, Purdue University's Engineering Gift Guide, National Parenting Center's Seal of Approval, Toy Insider's Top Holiday Toys, placement on the Dr. Toy list of 100 Best Children's Products and placement on the Dr. Toy list of Best Educational products, and the "Stem Approved" Trustmark from Stem.org.
product_description: Elenco Snap Circuits SC-750R Student Training Program: The Model SC-750R is an in-depth exploration of the electronic components included with the SC-750 Snap Circuits Extreme. Ideal for use in home schooling, middle schools and high schools, where students will grasp the basic principles of electronics. The Student Guide for the SC-750R includes 138 pages of educational curriculum. Written with the help of educators, the Student Guide is essential in covering all topics related to electricity and electronics being taught in middle schools and above. Includes real world applications and problem solving quizzes. The optional Teachers PAK Model TG-750, sold separately, includes five project books, teacher guide, and three student guides. The teacher guide is meant to prepare educators for proper introduction of Snap Circuits and guide them through each chapter with quizzes for students to test their knowledge. Topics Covered: Resistors, Capacitors, Transistors, Motors, Integrated Circuits, Switches, Series Circuits, Parallel Circuits, Batteries, Relays, Transformers, Digital Recording, 7-segment Displays, SCRs, Analog Meters, Diodes, FM Radio.
